name: Rite of Passage
originalText: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (The damage is dealt before the counter is put on.)

rulings.text: If the creature is dealt damage by more than one source at the same time, it gets only one counter.
The creature doesn’t get a counter if all the damage that would be dealt to it is prevented.

text: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)
